entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and rain showers ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:10 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:10 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
